I've looked for something like these for a bit.  I was specifically looking for something to get in the junction between the handles and the pots on my cookware.  Scratching up the surfaces is mostly what I have accomplished in the past.  These are perfect for that and so easy-to-use.

I have never actually owned crevice brushes before. I've managed by tooling together items to make something, but this is SO much nicer. They work wonderfully. 评论概述: May be helful to clean crevices and corners that are hard to reach

I got these so that we could clean all the crevices around our windows and sliding doors that love to collect dirt/dust and get gross. This worked great! I use this without any sprays first, to break up the dirt as best I can. Then I vacuum it up with a brush attachment on the vacuum. After I get all the loose pieces I spray the area and use the brush again. This gets even more off and then covered the brush with a thin cloth and went over it again to wipe up the area! It doesn't look good as new, but it looks so much better than it did!
Brushs are perfect for getting in-between the glass shower doors!

These are very versatile and the quality is great! I can think of so many uses for these. Of course they're great for edges in sinks, showers, window screen tracks and so many other uses, but the main reason I go them was for for cleaning my George Forman grill when I'm done cooking. I clean it after every single use to make sure it lasts and nothing sticks, but it was kind of a pain and used to take long because I'd wipe them down and not everything came off easily. I tried using these brushes and things came right off! I was using sponges and wet paper towels before, so now I don't have to keep using that and just put a paper plate at the edge of the grill to catch everything I brush off. Makes my life easier.  They can be pretty stiff, so you have to just make sure to use force, but not too much force, depending on what you're cleaning. These are so versatile. Happy you get so many in the pack!
Works fantastic cleaning the grout on your floors or walls.  Also great for cleaning the tracks on your windows or shower doors.

Sometimes all the energy we can muster is only enough to spray down and wipe a dirty countertop. And sometimes we have a manic episode and want to get every nook and cranny! Here’s your nook and cranny tool. It might surprise you that the dark line in the corner isn’t caulk lol I recommend

评论概述: Great addition to my clean freak arsenal!
评论详情: I ordered these thin crevice brushes primarily to clean grout. I used plain water on the kitchen floor grout. These versatile brushes work just the way they are supposed to. The handle is comfortable and the bristles are soft no-scratch. Next stop: sliding glass door tracks. I remember my dad telling me to let the tool do the work, so I didn't press very hard while using it. I expect the brush will last longer that way. Definitely worth the $.

I cannot recommend these brushes unfortunately. The furthest most aspect of the brush head is jagged metal. While cleaning, I permanently scratched my tub. You could easily cut yourself. The bristles bend out of shape even after the first use. These did not work well for me.

If you have to reach a very small space in an awkward area, this brush would be effective. However, I have found that this skinny scrubber just moves dust and dirt around. I still have to wipe everything up with something else like a rag or paper towel.

I use these for cleaning the faucets to prevent buildup. The bristles are stiff enough to get a good cleaning in, but gentle enough to not scratch finishes. Game changer for me—very satisfying to have clean fixtures. Totally worth it
These tough little brushes are the best for cleaning up tough grime. Makes cleaning easier.
They don’t work too well. Easy to use quality seems OK they don’t clean too good.

First time using one on the bathroom faucet --- bristles started falling off the top and falling into the sink.  Sadly I had the water running so they all ran down the drain before I could catch them.  Hope I don't have a back up problem later.
These brushes do the job intended.  Stiff but not too stiff.
I use this for my windows. Keeps the dirt for outside from building up and making it hard to open and close the windows.
Came apart the same day I used it

评论概述: Makes Hard to Reach Easy to Clean
评论详情: Nicely made brushes, with stiff but not abrasive bristles. Great for getting into nooks and crannies, but also wide enough to sweep broad swaths of countertops. Handle feels pretty nice, too.

Very nice and (I hope) durable 'grout' cleaning brushes.  Nice handles.  I can see using these for grout, around the sink, on the margin of toilet seat and the toilet (which are always hard to clean).  Just so many uses given the size and shape.  I can even see using these on certain edges and crevices on a car exterior.  These are very useful and these seem well down. The only concern is the bristles. They may needed to be of slightly wider diameter to hold up.
I find these brushes to help very handy. They can get into very small cracks and crevices to clean. The bristles are stiff enough to clean well, but not too stiff to scratch anything.

This brushes are great for all those small and hard to reach places that drive cleaning people crazy! Fan towers, washer and dryer crevices, random grooves in cabinets, windows, mirrors, etc. I'm docking a star because these may not last that long in reference to durability but they are getting the job done for now and at a great price point!

These brushes seem to be reasonably well made. If their shape/style fit your need, then go for it. They shouldn't be the only brushes you have in your cleaning arsenal, but I think they'll be on of the more popular ones you'd choose.
worked well for intended purpose.

Overall, I'm satisfied with these crevice cleaning brushes from the TQRR store. As always, there are pros and cons.  PROS: You actually get 4 brushes in this one package. It's a bargain -- and this is the sort of item that you suddenly need from time to time. Having 4 in a pack is great. The brushes are thin and lightweight. The size and handle fit are perfect. The different brushes have subtle differences in angle -- to accommodate different jobs. The nylon is soft and will not leave scratches or marks on a delicate surface.  CONS: There really aren't any downsides. My only personal complaint is that -- for cleaning the grout on my bathroom floor, the bristles were too soft and gentle. However, they certainly held up! I only needed two brushes to finish the task, so I have two left for other future jobs.
It works in very tight spots.does a good job.

评论概述: Incredible Brushes For Hard To Reach Places
评论详情: These brushes are PERFECT for hard to reach spots. Dish holders, window edges, baseboards, and especially corners! I really like that there's different colors.They have black brushes and white brushes. I use mostly the white brushes because it's easier to see the dirt and to wipe off when done using. It's also perfect for grout since the bristles hold so well. Now, with extra extra scrubbing, it does shed a bit but not terrible. But the bristless are quite stiff. And the base seems to be the toughest part. I love these and definitely recommend these to other excessive cleaners since it makes me happy. I keep one in the kitchen, the other bathroom, and the other two are for spares. But I'm very impressed so far and worth getting.

These crevice brushes are great to clean under the counter sinks and cleaning the baseboards.  I am not sure how long the bristles will last but for now they are doing good.  The thick handles is nice and fits well in the hand when cleaning.  The only thing I did notice is the front bristles are the one that get the most use.  I would like to see the brush either being a little more flexible or a more slight curve to it so the bristles in the back could get more use.
Perfect

The quality is really nice on these brushes. I only wish that one was softer than they are. I am not comfortable using on the chrome faucets in the bathroom or kitchen. The stiffer one will be great for cleaning grout.

评论概述: Just what I was looking for!
评论详情: I needed to replace the old nasty moldy looking calk around the tub. In order to get the next round of calk on nicely it's important to get the area clean. I used this brush set to clean all along the raw edges where I removed the calk. I then wiped it down with alcohol and calked it all up. Came out perfectly!!! These brushes have MANY uses.

评论概述: Very stiff brushes that are well made for cost. Great for cleaning out old grout or caulk.
评论详情: Very stiff brushes that are well made for cost. Great for cleaning out old grout or caulk. They do have some lose bristles but after those were out they mostly stayed together. If you are cleaning areas with a toothbrush and they can stand up to more pressure, these work better.

These edge brushes have soft but sturdy bristles so they don’t splay in different directions when scrubbing. They are softer bristles so good for surfaces that would scratch easily (no scratches with these). Since they are softer, they aren’t going to remove rough hardwater buildup, but otherwise, they are excellent for cleaning. Soft bristles make it an excellent tool for dry dusting in furniture crevices too.

评论概述: Works way better than a toothbrush for crevices.
评论详情: Oh man, these are great for crevices!  I have used many toothbrushes in my day to attempt getting into corners and cracks, especially in showers, tubs, grout lines, and faucets. The bristles are stiff enough to remove grime and the head is angled a little, which is perfect for reaching into those tight spots, like corners.  The handle is comfortable in my hand, too.  I’m calling it a win.

One thing I liked about these brushes was it gets in all the tight spaces.. The type of shower I have is very tight spaces between my shower doors, but I don’t like the bristles aren’t really that sturdy
